resources.string: A reference for the top algorithms asked by the top companies.
binary search, also known as half-interval search, logarithmic search, or binary chop, is a search algorithm that finds the position of a target value within a sorted array

selection sort is a sorting algorithm, specifically an in-place comparison sort. It has O time complexity, making it inefficient on large lists, and generally performs worse than the similar insertion sor
Recursion in computer science is a method of solving a problem where the solution depends on solutions to smaller instances of the same problem
